adviseScripts.text: Cats go "meow meow",
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: dogs go, "woof woof",
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: and Timi goes...
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Rowl Rowl!
Graul!
No no no!
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: That's the sound of a tiger.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: I'm a little disappointed in you, Zoo Keeper.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Yeah!
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: You're right!
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Some people think he goes "Rowl rowl",
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: but that's the roar of a tiger, not a lion.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Leona about Timi's roar.
It really eats me up inside how so many people are scared of Timi, just because he's a lion.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Especially when he's as cute as he is.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: What do you think I can do to make people realize how charming he can be?
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Promote the shelter volunteer program more heavily.
Make him wear a dog mask.
That's a great idea!
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: That way, more people will come to the shelter and get to see Timi for who he really is.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Once they realize how awesome he is, they're sure to spread the word.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Thanks for the suggestion, Zoo Keeper.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: No, we can't do that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Timi's face is integral to his charm.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: We can't cover that up!
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Leona about Timi's charm.
Maybe it's just me, but Biscuit seems a bit scared of me sometimes.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Am I really that intimidating?
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: It's not you, but rather the animals that you always have around you.
It can be a tad bit hard approaching you.
Hmm...
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: I guess that's a fair point.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Big animals can be kinda freaky to some people.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: What?
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: I always thought I was pretty friendly...
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Then what can I do to make Biscuit feel more comfortable?
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: I have a short conversation with Leona.
Did you know
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: there used to be these places called zoos?
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Animals were kept there, and people paid money to go see them.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Sounds like a lot of fun.
I feel sorry for the animals.
You think so?
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: I doubt the animals found it all that fun.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Becoming spectacles for humans all while being confined in tight spaces.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: I'm glad you feel that way too.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: None of those animals ever had a choice. They were forcibly confined and displayed as a spectacle.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: It must have been miserable.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: I'm glad such a thing doesn't exist anymore.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Leona and I talk more about zoos.
Biscuit likes kibble.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Nero likes kitty treats.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Do you remember what I like?
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Meat.
Vegetables.
Bingo!
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Meat is my favorite.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Especially when it's cooked blue, lightly seared on the outside, and red on the inside.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Huh?
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: I can't stand vegetables.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: I much prefer meat. There's much more to it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: All this talk of food is making me hungry.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Do you want to go eat together later?
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: I listen to Leona as she continues to extol the virtues of meat.
People often think that cats are the only ones that are lazy and loaf around all the time,
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: but lions are actually quite similar.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: They're always lying down and rolling around.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: G-grrr...?
adviseScripts.speaker: Timi

adviseScripts.text: They are a member of the cat family, after all.
Cats and lions have a lot in common. More than people think.
Wow!
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: You knew that already?
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: You're more interested in animals than I thought you were.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: That makes me really happy!
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Precisely.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: They've also got rough tongues
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: and have retractable claws.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: If you're interested, I've got plenty more factoids I could share with you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Leona about animals.
Timi has been shedding like crazy lately.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: I could probably knit a blanket with all the fur he's lost.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: You should brush Timi every day.
It's shedding season, so these things are inevitable.
Are you insinuating that I don't already do that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Zoo Keeper, that's mean.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Where do you think Timi's beautiful coat gets its luster?
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: I take great care to brush it every day.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: During the shedding season, it doesn't matter how often you brush them. They just keep shedding.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: You're right. No matter how much I brush him, it doesn't seem to make any difference.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: It takes me over an hour to remove all the strands of hair off my clothes.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Anyway, I'm impressed you knew about seasonal shedding.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Are you sure you don't want to volunteer at the animal shelter?
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: I have a discussion with Leona about Timi's shedding.
Have you ever touched Timi's paws?
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: They're so soft and squishy.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Would you like to try?
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Poke Timi's paw.
Poke Leona's side.
*Poke*
Graul?
adviseScripts.speaker: Timi

adviseScripts.text: Don't they feel lovely?
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: So squishy, hehe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: *Poke*
Hey!
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: You startled me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: What are you poking me for? I was talking about touching Timi's paw.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: I spend time with Leona while poking Timi's paws.
Graul! Graul!
adviseScripts.speaker: Timi

adviseScripts.text: Yeah, yeah! I feel the same way.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Graul.
adviseScripts.speaker: Timi

adviseScripts.text: No, that's not it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: What are you looking at me like that for, Zoo Keeper?
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Because you're so beautiful.
It's fascinating that you can communicate with Timi like that.
Haha, I can tell that's not the real reason,
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: but I'm happy hearing you saying that anyway.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Thanks.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: I find it interesting myself.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: I've always been able to tell what animals were saying.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: I wonder why other people are incapable of it?
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: I have an enjoyable time with Leona.
Zoo Keeper, let me give you a quiz.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: How many teeth does an adult lion have?
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Around 20.
Around 30.
Come on,
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: how could such a big cat only have 20 teeth?
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: I'm disappointed in you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: They usually tend to have about 30.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Correct!
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Honestly, Zoo Keeper, with your level of knowledge, I think I'd feel safe even entrusting Timi in your care.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: You're practically an animal expert.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Leona and I spend some time counting Timi's teeth.
There were three bears in one house. Daddy bear, mommy bear, baby bear.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: You know what I've always found fascinating?
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Bears can be such ferocious creatures, but they're oftentimes viewed as cute and cuddly.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: I think we have teddy bears to thank for that.
That's because bears are cute.
Maybe so, especially if that's the first image of bears you're exposed to when you're young.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Do you think people would find other animals less frightening if they were made into dolls?
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Wow!
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Do you really think so, Zoo Keeper?
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: You've got a keen eye.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Bears, lions, and other big animals are super cute when you see them up close.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: I hope other people will be able to appreciate how cute these big fellas can be.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Leona about cute animals.
Have you heard of the saying, "The bigger they are, the cuter they are."?
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Some students came to volunteer at the shelter, and I overheard one of them say that about Timi.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: I think that saying could apply to you as well, Leona.
So by that rationale, the smaller something is, the less cute it is?
Huh?
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: So I'm big in what sense?
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: As in my height? Or...
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Anyway, I'll take it as a compliment. Thank you, Zoo Keeper.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Oh, I didn't mean it like that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: You would be unpopular if you spoke in this way.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Haha, there's no need to sulk.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: In my eyes, you're as cute as can be.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Leona and I have an enjoyable time.
Although I'm a Nikke, I do fall prey to my own emotions sometimes.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Mostly feelings of exhaustion.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: What should I do to get over that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Talk to me whenever you're feeling tired.
Try talking to Biscuit or Nero.
I knew you would be someone I could depend on,
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Zoo Keeper.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: All right, when things get tough, I'll be sure to talk to you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: I'd like to do that,
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: but I'm their leader, so I don't want to show any weakness.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: I'll try to tough it out, and when I feel I can't, I'll talk to you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Is that okay?
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: I have a meaningful time with Leona.
When people say that someone has the heart of a lion,
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: it means that they're a determined and courageous person.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Do you know anyone like that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Me.
You.
Haha, I don't disagree,
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: but it's a bit strange to nominate yourself, you know.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Then again, even doing that takes a bit of courage, so I suppose it's admirable.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: I'm glad you see me that way, but
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: there are many things that I still lack.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Personally, I feel that you're the one with the heart of a lion.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: I have a meaningful time with Leona.
I've been wondering:
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: When you grill meat, how do you like to cook it?
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Rare.
Medium.
Me too!
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Have you heard of blue steak?
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: It's when you lightly sear the outside and that's all.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Personally, I prefer my meat rare or blue.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: I guess we're pretty similar in how we like our meat cooked.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Okay, so you like it somewhat cooked.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Personally, I prefer it as raw as possible, so rare is as high as I'll go.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: I guess we're a bit different in how we like our meat cooked.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: I have a discussion with Leona about cooking.
Do you think it's possible to raise big animals as household pets?
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Living together in the same space, going out on walks, giving them treats, and all that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: I think it would be hard.
I think it's certainly possible.
It certainly would be.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Even with a domesticated species like dogs, there are certain species which are less tame and require special attention.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Raising wild animals to be a household pet would be an even greater challenge.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: It's not completely impossible, but it's far too dangerous.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: I disagree.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: These are wild animals we're talking about here.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: The only reason the guys in the shelter are as docile as they are is because they've been trained by me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: They're usually far more ferocious and dangerous creatures.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Leona and I have a conversation about how to care for big animals.
There's a saying, "A lion always hunts to the hilt, even when trying to catch a rabbit."
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: What's your takeaway from that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: That you should try your best, no matter if the task is big or small.
Surviving in the wild isn't easy.
A fairly cookie-cutter answer.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: But did you know?
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Rabbits are faster than you think.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: For a lion, catching a rabbit isn't as easy as you may imagine.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: You're the first person to tell me that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: In the unforgiving environment that is nature, you have to give your utmost to every hunt, regardless of the size of the prey.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: On top of that, rabbits can run much faster than you might think.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: I appreciate you sharing your thoughts with me, Zoo Keeper.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: I have an enjoyable time with Leona.
Look at this!
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: I bought a scarf from the store.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Did you buy it for Timi?
Did you buy it for me?
That's right.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: I think Timi may be coming down with a cold,
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: so that's why I bought this for him.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: It's all the more convenient since a regular human-sized scarf is the perfect size for him.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Er... no, this is for Timi.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: I can see how you would have gotten that impression though.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Timi is big enough so that I can buy a regular scarf meant for humans.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Sorry if I got your hopes up...
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: I spend some time with Leona talking about just how large Timi is.
Ouch!
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Don't bite, Timi.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Timi chews lightly on Leona's head.
Don't your teeth hurt, Timi?
Doesn't your head hurt, Leona?
Graul?
adviseScripts.speaker: Timi

adviseScripts.text: Wait a minute.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Are you saying that my head is harder than Timi's teeth?
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: I mean... that's true, but still, it's not exactly flattering to hear.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: I'm okay.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: My head is pretty sturdy.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Timi knows that too, which is why he's comfortable doing this.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: I'm just worried that it might become a habit of his.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: I have an enjoyable time with Leona.
Boy, am I full.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: I just wanna roll around and doze off.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Graul.
adviseScripts.speaker: Timi

adviseScripts.text: Would you like to sleep in the Commander's Room?
I can wrap up our session early so you can go back and get some sleep.
Can I?
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: If you're sure it's okay, I'll borrow your bed for a moment.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Are you sure that's okay?
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: I'd really like to lie down.
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Is there any chance I can take a nap in the Commander's Room?
adviseScripts.speaker: Leona

adviseScripts.text: Graul.
adviseScripts.speaker: Timi

adviseScripts.text: Leona and Timi lie on the bed and fall asleep.
